Name: Adaptability
Description: The wielder's STAB modifier becomes 2x.

Name: Aftermath
Description: Deals 25% damage when KOed by contact damage.

Name: Air Lock
Description: Blocks the effects of weather.

Name: Analytic
Description: Raises the power of all moves by 30% if the wielder moves last.

Name: Anger Point
Description: Raises Attack to +6 if struck by a critical hit.

Name: Anticipation
Description: Alerts the wielder to certain dangerous moves.

Name: Arena Trap
Description: Prevents grounded Pokemon from switching. Increases encounter rate.

Name: Bad Dreams
Description: Deals 1/8 damage to sleeping opponents per turn.

Name: Battle Armor
Description: Prevents critical hits.

Name: Big Pecks
Description: The wielder's Defense cannot be lowered.

Name: Blaze
Description: Boosts power of Fire-type moves 50% when at 1/3 HP or less.

Name: Chlorophyll
Description: Speed doubles in sun.

Name: Clear Body
Description: The wielder's stats cannot be lowered.

Name: Cloud Nine
Description: Blocks the effects of weather.

Name: Color Change
Description: Foe's move changes the Pokemon's type.

Name: Compoundeyes
Description: Increases accuracy by 30%. Increases the chance of finding items on wild Pokemon.

Name: Contrary
Description: The wielder's stat changes are reversed.

Name: Cursed Body
Description: The wielder has a 30% chance to disable any move that hits it.

Name: Cute Charm
Description: Can infatuate Pokemon of opposite gender when struck.

Name: Damp
Description: Prevents the use of Selfdestruct or Explosion. Prevents Aftermath from doing damage.

Name: Defeatist
Description: Halves the wielder's Attack and Special Attack if its HP drops below 50%.

Name: Defiant
Description: Boosts Attack by two stages for every stat drop.

Name: Download
Description: The wielder gets a stat boost depending on its opponent's stats.

Name: Drizzle
Description: Summons permanent rain.

Name: Drought
Description: Summons permanent sun.

Name: Dry Skin
Description: The wielder absorbs Water-type moves and has a weakness to Fire-type moves. Heals in rain and is damaged by sun.

Name: Early Bird
Description: Reduces sleep time.

Name: Effect Spore
Description: 30% chance to paralyze, poison, or sleep when struck by a contact move.

Name: Filter
Description: Reduces damage from super effective hits by 1/4.

Name: Flame Body
Description: 30% chance to burn when struck by a contact move. Halves the number of steps required to hatch Eggs.

Name: Flare Boost
Description: Special Attack is increased by 50% when burned.

Name: Flash Fire
Description: Grants immunity to Fire-type moves and increases the power of Fire-type moves by 50% when hit by a Fire-type move.

Name: Flower Gift
Description: Raises stats of the wielder and its partner in sun.

Name: Forecast
Description: Changes type according to weather.

Name: Forewarn
Description: Tells which of the opponent's moves has the highest Base Power.

Name: Friend Guard
Description: Reduces damage done to a teammate by 25%.

Name: Frisk
Description: Reveals the foe's item.

Name: Gluttony
Description: Consumes pinch Berries at 50% HP or less.

Name: Guts
Description: Attack is increased by 50% when afflicted with status.

Name: Harvest
Description: After each turn, the wielder may receive the Berry it used at a 50% chance (100% if in sun).

Name: Healer
Description: 30% chance to heal an adjacent teammate of a status condition every turn.

Name: Heatproof
Description: Reduces damage from Fire-type moves by 50%.

Name: Heavy Metal
Description: The wielder's weight is doubled.

Name: Honey Gather
Description: Adds a chance of finding Honey after each in-game battle.

Name: Huge Power
Description: Doubles Attack.

Name: Hustle
Description: Physical moves do 50% more damage at the cost of 20% accuracy. Increases wild encounter rate with higher level Pokemon.

Name: Hydration
Description: Heals status effects in rain.

Name: Hyper Cutter
Description: The wielder's Attack cannot be lowered.

Name: Ice Body
Description: Heals 1/16 maximum HP in hail.

Name: Illuminate
Description: Increases wild encounter rate (no effect in battles).

Name: Illusion
Description: The wielder appears as the last Pokemon in the party to the opponent.

Name: Immunity
Description: The wielder cannot be poisoned.

Name: Imposter
Description: The wielder transforms into the opponent when it switches in.

Name: Infiltrator
Description: The wielder bypasses the foe's Light Screen, Reflect, Mist, and Safeguard.

Name: Inner Focus
Description: Prevents flinching.

Name: Insomnia
Description: Prevents sleep.

Name: Intimidate
Description: Lowers the foe's Attack one stage. Decreases wild encounter rate.

Name: Iron Barbs
Description: Deals 1/8% damage when the opponent makes contact.

Name: Iron Fist
Description: Increases the power of punching moves by 20%.

Name: Justified
Description: Raises Attack one stage when hit by a Dark-type move.

Name: Keen Eye
Description: The wielder's accuracy cannot be lowered.

Name: Klutz
Description: The wielder both is unaffected by and will not utilize held items.

Name: Leaf Guard
Description: Prevents status effects in sun.

Name: Levitate
Description: The wielder is immune to Ground-type moves.

Name: Light Metal
Description: The wielder's weight is halved.

Name: Lightningrod
Description: When hit with an Electric-type move, Special Attack is boosted by one stage. All Electric-type attacks are drawn to this Pokemon.

Name: Limber
Description: Prevents paralysis.

Name: Liquid Ooze
Description: Leeching moves cause the enemy to lose HP instead.

Name: Magic Bounce
Description: Bounces back certain non-damaging moves.

Name: Magic Guard
Description: Prevents indirect damage.

Name: Magma Armor
Description: Prevents freeze. Halves the number of steps required to hatch Eggs.

Name: Magnet Pull
Description: Prevents Steel-type Pokemon from switching. Increases the chance of encountering a Steel-type Pokemon in the wild.

Name: Marvel Scale
Description: Defense is increased by 50% when afflicted with status.

Name: Minus
Description: If allied with a Pokemon with Plus or Minus, the wielder's Special Attack increases by 50%.

Name: Mold Breaker
Description: Abilities that hinder attacks are nullified.

Name: Moody
Description: A random stat is lowered by 1 stage and another is boosted by 2 stages every turn.

Name: Motor Drive
Description: Grants immunity to Electric-type moves and boosts Speed by 1 stage when hit by an Electric-type move.

Name: Moxie
Description: Boosts Attack by one stage if the wielder knocks out another Pokemon.

Name: Multiscale
Description: Reduces damage by 50% if the wielder is at full health.

Name: Multitype
Description: Type changes depending on the held plate. Prevents item loss.

Name: Mummy
Description: The opponent's ability becomes Mummy when it hits the wielder with a contact move.

Name: Natural Cure
Description: Cures status on switching out.

Name: No Guard
Description: All attacks used by and used on the wielder will never miss.

Name: Normalize
Description: All moves used by the wielder are Normal-type.

Name: Oblivious
Description: Grants immunity to infatuation and Captivate.

Name: Overcoat
Description: Grants immunity to damage from weather effects.

Name: Overgrow
Description: Boosts power of Grass-type moves by 50% when at 1/3 HP or less.

Name: Own Tempo
Description: Prevents confusion.

Name: Pickpocket
Description: The wielder immediately steals an item from an attacker using a contact move.

Name: Pickup
Description: Adds a chance of finding an item after each in-game battle.

Name: Plus
Description: If allied with a Pokemon with Plus or Minus, the wielder's Special Attack increases by 50%.

Name: Poison Heal
Description: Heals 1/8 HP per turn when poisoned.

Name: Poison Point
Description: 30% chance to poison when struck by a contact move.

Name: Poison Touch
Description: The wielder has a 30% chance to poison the opponent when it uses a contact move.

Name: Prankster
Description: Moves that do not deal direct damage have their priority increased by one level.

Name: Pressure
Description: Enemy attacks lose one extra PP. Increases wild encounter rate.

Name: Pure Power
Description: Doubles Attack stat.

Name: Quick Feet
Description: Speed is increased by 50% when afflicted with status.

Name: Rain Dish
Description: Heals 1/16 maximum HP in rain.

Name: Rattled
Description: Raises Speed one stage when hit by a Bug-, Dark-, or Ghost-type move.

Name: Reckless
Description: Increases the power of recoil moves by 20%.

Name: Regenerator
Description: Wielder heals 1/3 of its maximum HP on switching out.

Name: Rivalry
Description: Move power depends on gender of the opponent.

Name: Rock Head
Description: Recoil moves deal no recoil damage.

Name: Rough Skin
Description: Deals 1/8 damage when the opponent makes contact.

Name: Run Away
Description: Increases chances of successfully escaping a random battle.

Name: Sand Force
Description: Increases power of Ground-, Rock-, and Steel-type attacks by 30% in a sandstorm.

Name: Sand Rush
Description: Speed doubles in sandstorm.

Name: Sand Stream
Description: Summons permanent sandstorm.

Name: Sand Veil
Description: Evasion increases by 25% in a sandstorm.

Name: Sap Sipper
Description: Grants immunity to Grass-type moves and boosts Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Grass-type move.

Name: Scrappy
Description: Can hit Ghost-types with Fighting- and Normal-type moves.

Name: Serene Grace
Description: This Pokemon's secondary effect chances are doubled.

Name: Shadow Tag
Description: Prevents switching.

Name: Shed Skin
Description: 1/3 chance to heal status every turn.

Name: Sheer Force
Description: Increases power of moves with secondary effects by 30%, but removes the effects.

Name: Shell Armor
Description: Prevents critical hits.

Name: Shield Dust
Description: Secondary effects won't occur.

Name: Simple
Description: Doubles all status boosts and drops.

Name: Skill Link
Description: Multi-hit moves will always hit the maximum number of times.

Name: Slow Start
Description: Attack and Speed are halved for 5 turns.

Name: Sniper
Description: Critical hits do 3x damage instead of 2x.

Name: Snow Cloak
Description: Evasion increases 25% in hail.

Name: Snow Warning
Description: Summons permanent hail.

Name: Solar Power
Description: HP decreases in the sun. Special Attack increases by 50%.

Name: Solid Rock
Description: Reduces damage from super effective hits by 25%.

Name: Soundproof
Description: Unaffected by sound moves.

Name: Speed Boost
Description: Speed increases at end of the turn.

Name: Stall
Description: The wielder moves last.

Name: Static
Description: 30% chance to paralyze when struck by a contact move.

Name: Steadfast
Description: Speed is boosted one stage when flinched.

Name: Stench
Description: Increases the chance that the opponent will flinch when the wielder attacks. Decreases wild encounter rate.

Name: Sticky Hold
Description: The wielder's item cannot be removed. Increases chance of encountering Pokemon while fishing.

Name: Storm Drain
Description: When hit with a Water-type move, Special Attack is boosted by one stage. All Water-type attacks are drawn to this Pokemon.

Name: Sturdy
Description: If the wielder is at full HP, it will survive any attack. OHKO moves will fail.

Name: Suction Cups
Description: Cannot be forced to switch. Increases chance of encountering Pokemon while fishing.

Name: Super Luck
Description: Critical hit rate is boosted by one stage.

Name: Swarm
Description: Boosts power of Bug-type moves by 50% when at 1/3 HP or less.

Name: Swift Swim
Description: Speed doubles in rain.

Name: Synchronize
Description: When afflicted with status, the enemy is afflicted also. Can pass nature to wild Pokemon.

Name: Tangled Feet
Description: Evasion increases when confused.

Name: Technician
Description: Increases the Base Power of moves with 60 or less by 50%.

Name: Telepathy
Description: Does not take damage from allies' attacks.

Name: Teravolt
Description: Abilities that hinder attacks are nullified.

Name: Thick Fat
Description: Fire- and Ice-type damage is reduced by 50%.

Name: Tinted Lens
Description: Doubles damage on resisted hits.

Name: Torrent
Description: Boosts power of Water-type moves by 50% when at 1/3 HP or less.

Name: Toxic Boost
Description: Attack is increased by 50% when poisoned.

Name: Trace
Description: Copies foe's ability.

Name: Truant
Description: The wielder does nothing every other turn.

Name: Turboblaze
Description: Abilities that hinder attacks are nullified.

Name: Unaware
Description: Ignores stat boosts and debuffs on other Pokemon other than Speed.

Name: Unburden
Description: Speed increases when an item is used or lost.

Name: Unnerve
Description: Prevents the foe from consuming its held Berry item.

Name: Victory Star
Description: Increases the accuracy of the wielder and allies on its side of the field by 10%.

Name: Vital Spirit
Description: Prevents sleep. Increases wild encounters with higher level Pokemon.

Name: Volt Absorb
Description: Heals 25% HP when hit by an Electric-type attack.

Name: Water Absorb
Description: Heals 25% HP when hit by a Water-type attack.

Name: Water Veil
Description: Prevents burn.

Name: Weak Armor
Description: Boosts Speed by 1 stage and lowers Defense by 1 stage when hit by a physical move.

Name: White Smoke
Description: The wielder's stats cannot be lowered. Decreases wild encounter rate.

Name: Wonder Guard
Description: Only super effective attacks harm the wielder.

Name: Wonder Skin
Description: Reduces the accuracy of a status move to 50%.

Name: Zen Mode
Description: The wielder changes forme when below 50% of its max HP.
